entry.data:
SUNNY, HOT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 108

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SHOWERS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS AROUND 60

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
